attributes.additional_details:
BBC And UK Government Ignore Romanian Dog slaughter for 3 months now!
Barbaric torture of dogs.
Romanian TV tell people to kill dogs.
BBC will not show the truth.
They promote Romania on The One Show.
And BBC told me to stop contacting them about this evil animal abuse. BBC Europe writes lies! I expose Death camp for dogs Romania  public hell shelter.
 Dogs in cells, screaming in agony with sores, broken bones. Ignored and starved to death. This country in the EU and breaking laws with the way they killing the dogs. Britain can not ignore us any more. UK Government needs to stop ignoring me, and act!
